law.catch_line: As to any savings account that has a withdrawal value of less than $25, a savings and loan associati...

text.section:
As to any savings account that has a withdrawal value of less than $25, a savings and loan association:
Need not pay a dividend or interest on the account; and
May not charge a penalty or service charge.
This section does not apply to a negotiable or transferable order of withdrawal account.
